alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Sabine; Union; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 15 at 6:09PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 140 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS UNION IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA HEMPSTEAD HOWARD LAFAYETTE LITTLE RIVER MILLER NEVADA SEVIER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 PARISHES IN NORTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA UNION IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE DE SOTO SABINE WEBSTER IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS ANGELINA BOWIE CASS CHEROKEE HARRISON MARION NACOGDOCHES PANOLA RUSK SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SHELBY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BERNICE, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, CARTHAGE, CENTER, DE QUEEN, DIERKS, EL DORADO, FARMERVILLE, HAYNESVILLE, HEMPHILL, HENDERSON, HOMER, HOPE, HUGHES SPRINGS, JACKSONVILLE, JEFFERSON, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LOGANSPORT, LUFKIN, MAGNOLIA, MANSFIELD, MANY, MARSHALL, MINDEN, MINERAL SPRINGS, NACOGDOCHES, NASHVILLE, PINELAND, PLEASANT HILL, PRESCOTT, QUEEN CITY, RUSK, SAN AUGUSTINE, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, STONEWALL, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, AND ZWOLLE.

area.areaDesc: Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Sabine; Union; Webster
